content.html: 58 years of Dr Who and 13 official doctors. 1 female doctor and yet it is 1 too many. The vast majority of action & game protagonists are male. Yet the v. few women presented in those spaces are robbing boys of role models. Give me a massive break. ðŸ™„ðŸ¤¨ bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politiâ€¦
